name: QuickCodes OTP Bot
description: Telegram bot for selling OTP virtual numbers via provider API

DATABASE_URL.description: Database connection URL (e.g. Postgres, Mongo, or SQLite)

PROVIDER_API_KEY.description: API key from your OTP provider

PROVIDER_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of OTP provider API (e.g. https://api.provider.com)

PROVIDER_ENDPOINT_GET_NUMBER.description: Endpoint path to request a number (e.g. /getNumber)

PROVIDER_PARAM_APIKEY.description: Query param name for API key

PROVIDER_PARAM_SERVICE.description: Query param name for service identifier

PROVIDER_PARAM_COUNTRY.description: Query param name for country code

PROVIDER_PARAM_ORDER_ID.description: Query param name for order/transaction ID

MIN_BALANCE_REQUIRED.description: Minimum balance required for users to use the bot
